column1: #text=Yesterday , I decided to take a bus to visit my friends at the beach .
#text=I checked the bus schedule on my computer .
#text=Around the time the bus would be in the area , I walked from my house to the bus stop .
#text=I wanted with other riders for the bus to arrive .
#text=When it did , I boarded the bus and paid for my ride with coins .
#text=I then took the first available seat towards the front of the bus .
#text=There was a older lady seated next to me and we had a nice conversation .
#text=The bus stopped at various locations and people got on and off .
#text=When a pregnant woman got on the bus , I stood up and let her have my seat .
#text=I then stood and held the pole in the middle of the bus to keep stable as the bus lurched during it 's starts and stops .
#text=Before long , the bus arrived at the bus stop closest to the beach and I exited the bus to meet my friends .
